note:
"Be Excellent To Everyone & Don't Feed The Trolls"
I'm me, you're you. 'nuff said.

Dyspraxic: I express myself badly.
Hard Of Hearing; Physically Handicapped (long list), RA & more.

99% of comments are snark, other 101% - sleep deprivation.

I repost/boost a lot, emoji react even more.
If you get a "like" on Masto etc, it's probably an emoji you cannot see.

Life is too short so I may mute / defollow / defollower - without warning - thoughtless people.

#NoIndex #NoBot #NoBridge

Of A Certain Age, Weirdbird, Weirder SOH.
Left Handed, Plant-Based*, Old School Greenie,
Androgynous Demisexual / Dyke, She / Her / Hers / Herself etc... But I HATE Labels.
Eternally Curious, mainly Science, Art, Classics, Ecology, Archeology & History, Wild Flora & Fauna.
Wild about DOGGOS!

Not me but close:
Phranc's "Dress Code"
k.d. lang's "Luck In My Eyes"
